<!-- Predict Secondary Targets for drugs; Of specifial interest where primamry is expressed in only few cell lines -->
```{r}
knitr::knit('../3.Tools/Step0_Write_Functions.Rmd')
knitr::knit('../3.Tools/Step0B_Data_and_Libraries.Rmd')
```

<!-- Identify the sec Target  corr matrix -->
```{r}
drugVScrispr_corr_features_list_secondary=readRDS('/Users/sinhas8/Project_TrueTarget/Data/drugVScrispr_corr_features_list_secondary.RDS')
```
<!-- All corrmat, corrmat_P, corrmat_FDR, corrmat_rank -->
```{r}
sec_corrMat=do.call(cbind, sapply(drugVScrispr_corr_features_list_secondary, function(x) err_handle(x[,2])))
sec_corrMat_P=do.call(cbind, sapply(drugVScrispr_corr_features_list_secondary, function(x) err_handle(x[,1])))
sec_corrMat_rank=apply(-sec_corrMat, 2, rank)
```
<!-- Find features of secondary Targets -->
```{r}
bestSecTarget_ID=apply(sec_corrMat, 2, which.max)
bestSecTarget_ID[sapply(bestSecTarget_ID, length)==0]=NA
BestSecTarget_details=data.frame(drugbroadID=colnames(sec_corrMat),
                         gene_matLocation=as.numeric(unlist(bestSecTarget_ID)),
                         genename=strsplit_customv0(names(unlist(bestSecTarget_ID)), '\\.', 2)
                         )
BestSecTarget_details_ordered=BestSecTarget_details[
  match(KnownTarget_predictions$drugBroadID, BestSecTarget_details$drugbroadID),]
# Best secondary Target correlation
KnownTarget_predictions$Sec_BestPredcorr=sapply(1:nrow(KnownTarget_predictions), function(x)
  err_handle(sec_corrMat[BestSecTarget_details$genename[x],
                         BestSecTarget_details$drugbroadID[x]]) )
# Best secondary Target
KnownTarget_predictions$Sec_BestTargetName=BestSecTarget_details_ordered$genename

# Best secondary Target Predicted Rank
KnownTarget_predictions$Sec_BestPred_P=sapply(1:nrow(KnownTarget_predictions), function(x)
  err_handle(sec_corrMat_P[BestSecTarget_details$genename[x],
                         BestSecTarget_details$drugbroadID[x]]) )
KnownTarget_predictions$Sec_BestPred_FDR=fdrcorr(KnownTarget_predictions$Sec_BestPred_P)
saveRDS(KnownTarget_predictions, '/Users/sinhas8/Project_TrueTarget/Data/KnownTarget_predictions_v4.RDS')
```
<!-- Best Secondary Targets -->
```{r}
Cond1=KnownTarget_predictions$Whether_interaction
Cond2=KnownTarget_predictions$PredictedRank<523
Cond3=KnownTarget_predictions$Sec_BestPred_FDR<0.1
Cond4=KnownTarget_predictions$cellLines_withLOWexp>200
Cond5=KnownTarget_predictions$Sec_BestPredcorr>0.5
KnownTarget_predictions[which(
  # Cond1 &
                                Cond2 &
                                Cond3 &
                                Cond4 & 
                                Cond5),]
```
<!-- What about other BTK inhibitors? Do they also target EGFR? -->
```{r}
KnownTarget_predictions[grep('BTK',KnownTarget_predictions$MaxTargetName),]
```
<!-- What about other AR inhibitors? -->
```{r}
KnownTarget_predictions[which(KnownTarget_predictions$MaxTargetName=='AR'),]
```
```{r}
KnownTarget_predictions_unique=KnownTarget_predictions[!duplicated(KnownTarget_predictions$drugName),]
head(sort(table(KnownTarget_predictions_unique$Sec_BestTargetName), decreasing = T))
KnownTarget_predictions[which(KnownTarget_predictions$Sec_BestTargetName=='ERBB3'),]
grep('EBBR',KnownTarget_predictions$Sec_BestTargetName)
```
